statements: SELECT * FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule;
SELECT equipment_name, task_name, task_status, scheduled_time FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule;
SELECT * FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE task_status='Completed';
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, task_name FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE scheduled_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT equipment_name, task_name FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE scheduled_time >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT id, equipment_name, task_name, task_status FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, task_status FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule GROUP BY task_status;
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration FROM tasks WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT id, task_id, start_time FROM schedule WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%clean%';
SELECT id, equipment_id, end_time FROM schedule WHERE start_time >= '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT id, task_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM schedule GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT task_name, estimated_duration FROM tasks ORDER BY estimated_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule;
SELECT task_name,  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,start_time,end_time) AS duration_minutes FROM Schedule;
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM Equipment;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-01-31'
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM Schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT task_name, duration_minutes, Equipment.equipment_name FROM Tasks JOIN Equipment ON Tasks.equipment_id = Equipment.id

SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time, Equipment.equipment_name FROM Schedule JOIN Tasks ON Schedule.task_name = Tasks.task_name JOIN Equipment ON Tasks.equipment_id = Equipment.id WHERE Tasks.duration_minutes > 30
SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM Tasks JOIN Equipment ON Tasks.equipment_id = Equipment.id GROUP BY Equipment.equipment_name HAVING task_count > 5
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT id, name, type FROM Robot WHERE type='Cleaning';
SELECT name, location FROM Robot ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT r.name, t.description, s.date FROM Robot r JOIN Task t ON r.id = t.robot_id JOIN Schedule s ON t.id = s.task_id;
SELECT * FROM Task WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robot;
SELECT id, name, type FROM Robot WHERE type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT r.id, r.name, t.description FROM Robot r INNER JOIN Task t ON r.id = t.robot_id;
SELECT s.date, s.time, t.status FROM Schedule s INNER JOIN Task t ON s.task_id = t.id WHERE t.status = 'Completed';
SELECT f.name, r.location FROM Farm f LEFT JOIN Robot r ON f.id = r.id;
SELECT * FROM schedule;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT task_description, duration FROM tasks WHERE equipment_id = 2 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT name, type, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT area_name, location, size, soil_type FROM farm_areas WHERE size > 10 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT * FROM schedule;
SELECT task_name, start_time, end_time FROM schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY name;
SELECT area_name, location, size FROM farm_areas WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' ORDER BY size DESC;
